data.message: You doing a track with him? Be great.  I don't think there was ever really any beef just over staged by the media. Drake is a talent undoubtly BUT i think he'd be an idiot to even try and go in with a diss track

replies.message: Drake was beefing with joe budden apparently and joe is signed to shady records thats why the media brought ems name into it..media are so gay.
i know :) Big fan of drake and his music he's got skills and has done some GOOD diss tracks in past but he'd look weak next to em. Would love see them colab
I'm a big drake fan too and agree with you 100. A collab would be great admist all these rumours
Drake was doing a show tonight and he brought em out on stage..drakes new album is nice tho i like it..i saw eminem at wembley in england 2014 best thing i ever did.
Everybody was smoking weed i was pissed i left mine at home  😂
if he does a track with him watch for the subliminal dis like he did with Lil Wayne.
Drakes not even a rapper straight pop, soft as hell too. Em would body his ass. I want this to happen so bad.
